title: Spacious and Sunny 3 Bedroom Near Southport Corridor
posting_body: ['3 bedroom, 1 bathroom 3rd floor apartment for rent in a family owned vintage brick 3 flat in Lakeview.', 'Large sun drenched living room with decorative fireplace 3 good size bedrooms with great closets.', 'Separate dining room with gorgeous original wood built in china cabinet.', 'Newly renovated kitchen with brand new cabinets, granite countertops, island and stainless steel appliances plus dishwasher waiting to be installed.', 'Freshly painted with hardwood floors and original wood trim throughout.', 'All renovations will be complete and ready for move in.', 'Lots of storage with 2 extra closets and original wood built in linen cabinet.', 'Laundry in building.', 'Radiator heat and water included.', 'Permit street parking.', 'Ideally located just steps to shopping and restaurants in Southport Corridor, close to grocery stores, easy public transit with brown and red lines near by, 9 min walk to Wrigley Field.', '$2500/ month with a year lease and $500 security deposit.', 'Proof of employment required.', 'March 1st move in date but flexible for sooner.', 'Call or text Gene at 773-983-4217']
